Sentencas: The La0.8Sr0.2CrO3(LSC) coating layer' prepared by plasma splaying is an effective means of providing oxidation resistance of ferrite, stainless steel as interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Influence of Post-Treatment on the Performances of Plasma Spraying La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 Coating Layer on Ferritic Stainless Steel as Interconnects for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results show that a denser coating layer is acquired and the area specific resistances (ASRs) of the,LSC coating layer and LSC coating layer modified by post treatment are 0.18 and 0.015 Omega cm(2), respectively, at 800 degrees C after oxidation at 1200 degrees C for 20 h, indicating the oxidation resistances of the modified LSC coating layer is significanfly irnproVal.
Titulo: Influence of Post-Treatment on the Performances of Plasma Spraying La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 Coating Layer on Ferritic Stainless Steel as Interconnects for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
